hero.description: A determinated, passionate, responsible, and persevering individual, always in pursuit of new learning and growth oportunities.

items.title: What type of work do I do?
items.description: As a passionate website developer, I identify as a full stack developer who enjoys tackling all related areas, from design to backend aand frontend. My goal is to create impactful and funcional digital experiences that exceed the expectations of the target users.

items.title: What I am passionate about and what are the things I value?
items.description: I am passionate to create appealing and funcional websites that add value to the user. I value well-done work and the effort that people invest in a team.

items.title: What type of work culture am I looking for?
items.description: I am looking for a place where I can grow professionally and enhance my programming and design skills. I would love to work in a team where there is mutual support to achieve the best possible outcome in any given task.

items.title: What am I currently doing?
items.description: Currently, I work as a freelance developer, tackling real and challenging projects. I believe this is a great way to enhance my skills while seeking better job opportunities.

items.title: My education and academic certitifications
items.description: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Business Informatics from the University of Costa Rica, a UX Design certificate from Google, and an Agile Explorer badge from IBM SkillsBuild. Additionally, I have several certificates from Udemy that have allowed me to enhance specific programming skills.

featured.title: Sala de Belleza y Academia Eleganzza
featured.description: The website has been created with the purpose of providing detailed information about the courses and services offered by the academy. It was build using Next.js, incorporating authentication and an administrative system.

featured.title: La Flor de Playa Negra
featured.description: The website aims to privide information about cabins for future rentals. It includes a landing page and individual pages for each cabin with their respective information. It was build using Next.js, incorporating authentication and an administrative system.

featured.title: FutsalaSC
featured.description: FutsalaSC is a student initiative, the purpose of the website is to share news related to sports. It features an administrative system for creating, updating, and deleting news.

secondary.title: age-calculator-app
secondary.description: On this web site you can know your age in years, months and days given a date of birth.

secondary.title: pokemon-app-next
secondary.description: With this web site I was able to understand the fundamentals of Next.js thanks to the course by Professor Fernando Herrera.

secondary.title: Botanica_web
secondary.description: One of my first web projects from university that I was proud of.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: I am currently looking for new job opportunities. Feel free to contact me anytime, my computer and I will be happy to respond to you! :D

footer.caption2: Design inspired by <0>Brittany Chiang's</0> portfolio and the <1>Vercel</1> website.
